bill.summary:
Stop Corrupt Iranian Oligarchs and Entities Act
This bill directs the Department of the Treasury to report Congress on Iranian individuals and parastatal groups that have close relationships with the Iranian government, including information regarding (1) their known sources of income, (2) their indices of corruption, (3) their involvement in key U.S. economic sectors, and (4) the potential effects of imposing sanctions on them.
